exthheader.author: Cameron Riley
exthheader.description:
A Friends to lovers romance

The truth could set him free … or break his heart

Nate Dixon has a reputation as one of the strictest chaperones in the world of MMA fighting. He wants the sport to be safe, so when he escorts athletes during drug tests, he refuses to hide bad results. His life is his work -- until the only man he’s ever wanted crashes back into it.

Ash Trent is a top MMA fighter, living and training at an exclusive, specialized gym, and Nate’s been assigned as his chaperone for the next three months. The single night they spent together is branded on Nate’s memory. The problem is, Ash left the next day without a word … and in the seven long years since, he’s had nothing but girlfriends.

Things get even more complicated after Nate needs a place to stay, and Ash tells him he can live at the gym … but they’ll have to pretend to be married. Then Nate encounters a situation that challenges his straight-arrow ethics. With both his conscience and his heart in danger, will he risk it all for love?

The Groom's Chaperone is a standalone gay romance with no cliffhangers or cheating. It has a HEA ending and explicit scenes.
exthheader.subject: Romance; Contemporary; Kindle Unlimited
